overview:
Business Development & Technology Evangelism for ISVs at Microsoft Email: maor@maordavid.com

Experienced results-driven, creative and visionary software R&D manager with more than 15 years in software development using advanced methodologies and state-of-the-art technologies. Vast and proven experience at enterprises and startup companies, leading tailor-made solutions, off-the-shelve products and consulting. A motivational leader who binds strong technical, business and managerial abilities.

Also experienced in technical presales, working with international customers, including defining customer technical needs and requirements.

An accomplished speaker who has been giving lectures at conferences such as TechEd, Developer Academy, World Wide Summit of Cloud Computing & more.

Particularly interested in Cloud Computing, Enterprise solutions, massively distributed applications and big data technologies.

Currently working as the technology advisor for the Israeli ISV market in Microsoft. This role allows me opportunities with partners in business development & technical leadership using the latest Microsoft technologies. Responsible on driving adoption, business development with partners and business management.

B.Sc in Computer Science & MBA. In 2008 was titled by Microsoft as MVP for Visual Studio (first ever in Israel).
